reviews.review: I love this game its great to play with friends and there is plenty of DLC to keep your attention the only thing that i can fault this game on is some of the people that play as killers. please stop camping. it kills the game for everyone and thats a real downfall to this game. the devs really need to fix the camping problem.

I think I understand a bit about the game now.
Enough to say that the game is quite good, and the devs are quite frustating.

The devs are astoundingly slow to implement even the most simple and basic of balancing changes.
The changes they do make are few and far between, often missing the mark, and always break fundamental aspects of the game every patch without fail.
The devs refuse to listen to community feedback. You can give feedback, but it won't mean anything. They won't do anything about it.
The community has been asking for many changes for years now, with no response or even acknowledgement.
Their communications are entirely 1-sided and utterly opaque, furthermore they demonstrate a lack of understanding of their own game, as well as flagrant unwillingness or inability to fix numerous bugs that I've learned have actually been in the game for years at this point.

Despite all of these extremely vexing issues, is this game still good?
Yes.
The strategy and tactics, the skillsets and powers, the unique or memey perk builds you can put together, it's all great stuff.
Extremely enjoyable, and could be so much moreso if the devs weren't the way that they are.
I hope one day this game reaches its full potential.

Das Spiel an sich ist relativ gut gestaltet und macht SpaÃŸ, allerdings gibt es Ã¶fters mal den ein oder anderen Bug. Was ich lustig finde sind immer die ganzen toxic survivor die nachdem sie verloren haben unter einem steam Profil schreiben wie schlecht man doch ist. Einfach auf kommentieren nur fÃ¼r Freunde stellen und fertig. Das neue mmr System ist akzeptabel, nur muss ich sagen, dass ich merke wie die survivor gen rushen. Obwohl man keine langen und schlechten chases macht, poppen 2 Gens da die Geschwindigkeit bei dem man ein gen macht einfach zu hoch ist. Man kann nur einen survivor chasen wÃ¤hrend 3 andere sich auf Gens fokussen kÃ¶nnen. Keys an sich sind auch broken da mal so eben 3 Leute unverdient fliehen kÃ¶nnen. Die ganzen perks die man bei killer sowohl als auch bei survivor sieht sind immer die selben sweat perks. Wer keine meta perks hat, der wird relativ schnell verlieren. Allgemein kann ich sagen macht mir das Spiel trotzdem noch SpaÃŸ (nicht).

Asymmetrical games are hard to balance - this game has done its best but...there's still a whiles to go (there's quite a few killers who need a serious buff and a couple of perks which need some serious nerfing). BUT, in saying that, it's still incredibly fun - and the fact that its still fun in it's broken state says a lot.
A really fun game to play with your friends, It's a bit hard at the beginning but once you get used to the gameplay you will have so much fun.
Can be very entertaining at times. Repeats itself a lot so that may be a negative in some peoples eyes.
This game is fun when the killers and survivers are not trolling,

it's a good game, but be ready to be freaked out, also have good internet and a huge drive. This is a big game with a lot of huge downloads

A surprisingly nuanced game that can be enjoyable for both beginners who just want to run around stabbing people, as well as veterans who want to figure out the best way to micromanage their loadouts for each killer/survivor. The base characters are surprisingly fun to play as and the DLC is reasonably priced, becoming a steal when it is on sale (I purchased pretty much all killers on PC and PS4 while it was on sale so me and the roommates can all play). While there are some hardcore players who whoop my tail every time, even being a newbie and some years late to the game I've found myself winning more often than I would have expected, and I still feel I have yet to master my main (24 hrs at time of review). This is pretty much what I feel the Friday the 13th game SHOULD have been; asymmetrical MP done right.
Amazing game bunch of people to unlock and a bunch of killers to unlock i would definetly reccoment this game

I play league of legends and ive seen less toxicity than in this game. I only play with friends and have 0 intention of playing this game solo ever. I have no problem with the core premise if the the game or the purposefully unbalanced game play, but in this game there are so many ways to be a genuine d1ck and ruin the nights of everyone else playing and there are no penalties for bad behavior. The most ive ever seen is temp bans for dcing mid match which the majority of people who do dc are the ones being harassed in game to begin with.
It has cross play and it also has all of my favourite horror franchises all in one. I have so much fun playing this game.  Love it!
this game is fuckin fun as shit if ur not a pussy

its a good game, but i feel like the MMR is just getting even more worse by the years passing on. Sometimes i get only one survivor who is blood in my killer games or just two very high ranking survivors in lower rank or its just the opposite with survivor where i get one blood and its just really lower rank survivors. if you have taken a break on this game for at least 2 years then you come back to this nonsense that the developers made is not good. 

BUTT, its still a good game none other than the less. just please devs make sure to at least think about the stuff before you add them in.
